name: Lasagna
author: Beverly Essner

ingredients.name: pint tomato juice or 1 lb. can of tomatoes

instructions: Brown meat and drain fat. Add garlic, basil, 1 1?2 teaspoon salt, tomato juice and tomato paste. Prepare lasagna noodles and cook according to package directions. Drain and rinse. In a separate bowl mix together eggs, cottage cheese, Parmesan cheese, parsley, 1 tea- spoon salt, and pepper. Lay half noodles in 13 x 92 x 2 inch pan. Spread with half cottage cheese filling, half Mozzarella, and half meat mixture. Repeat. Bake at 375Â° for 30 minutes. Let stand 10-15 min- utes before cutting into squares. Can be made ahead and refrigerated. Bake for 45 minutes in that case.
